name: AG6202 Chip HDMI to VGA Adapter, 1080P Video Converter for Laptop PC TV Monitor Projector, Gold Plated Connector Cable
short_description: 🌊【Full HD 1080P @ 60Hz, Stable & Flicker-Free Display】 Experience crystal-clear clarity without any annoying flickering or blurriness. This HDMI to VGA Converter delivers a high-resolution video signal up to 1080P at 60Hz, ensuring every frame is sharp, vibrant, and smooth. Perfect for business presentations, movies, and gaming, providing an immersive viewing experience that's easy on the eyes.

🔌【Wide Compatibility & Effortless Plug-and-Play】 This HDMI to VGA Adapter offers extensive compatibility, seamlessly connecting your Laptop, PC, MacBook, or gaming consoles like PS5, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch to any Monitor, Projector, or TV with a VGA port. The Plug and Play design requires no drivers, making setup instant and simple.

💻【Dual Monitor Modes: Mirror & Extend for Productivity】 Maximize your efficiency with two distinct modes. Use Mirror Mode to display identical content on both screens, ideal for presentations. Switch to Extended Display mode to expand your desktop across both monitors, perfect for multitasking and enhancing your workflow.

🛡️【Advanced AG6202 Chip for Flawless Signal Conversion】 Powered by the premium AG6202 chip, this HDMI to VGA Converter guarantees superior performance. It effectively eliminates signal loss, ghosting, and flickering, providing a stable transmission that preserves HDMI to VGA video quality without distortion.

🎮【Durable, Universal Adapter for All Your Devices】 Built with a sturdy ABS shell, this versatile adapter for laptop, desktop, and gaming consoles is your reliable solution for the office, classroom, or home. Easily connect your computer to a monitor or projector for a seamless big-screen experience for work, entertainment, and gaming.
product_description: This high-performance converter, equipped with an advanced AG6202 chip, stably transforms HDMI signals to VGA, delivering crystal-clear 1080P@60Hz output. It offers wide compatibility with laptops, desktops, and gaming consoles (PS5/Xbox/Switch) for monitors and projectors. Featuring both mirror and extended modes, it's the reliable choice for work, teaching, and entertainment.

product_description: This active HDMI to VGA adapter converts an HDMI video source to a VGA output, allowing connection to legacy VGA monitors, displays, and projectors. This universal video converter requires no drivers or software and is compatible with any operating system, including Windows, macOS, ChromeOS, and Linux. It works with HDMI-enabled laptops, desktops, tablets, and Chromebooks from all hardware platforms, such as Intel, Nvidia, and AMD. It supports resolutions up to 1920x1200 or 1920x1080 at 60Hz, utilizing the integrated or dedicated GPU for minimal CPU usage. The adapter reduces clutter and simplifies setup by eliminating the need for an external power adapter or USB power connection. The Adapter has a compact and lightweight design, making it ideal for travel or on-the-go use. This black video adapter features a 5mm cable outer diameter, and a cable length of 5.8 inches (14.7 cm). Connect a primary VGA monitor to the host, or add a secondary extended or mirrored display to a workstation. It supports VGA screw-locking cables to prevent the cable from coming loose or accidentally disconnecting. Note: This video adapter is unidirectional, converting only from an HDMI source to a VGA monitor or display.
